description.en: The story takes place in Okinawa, where Haruka forms a beach volleyball pair with Kanata. Kanata, who couldn't handle the pressure put on her by her short height, had given up on beach volleyball already, but is convinced by Haruka to step back on the sand once again and aim for the junior tournament.

After a great catastrophe stuck, humanity started living in anarchy. Acid rain floated across the sky, wild wolves roared in the wilderness, the consortium in the barrier sang night after night, and the refugees outside the wall were hungry and cold. “Ren Xiaosu”, who was born as a refugee, unlocked the palace system and continued to grow stronger by absorbing positive energy, fighting for survival, protecting relatives and friends, saving sentient beings, and gradually changing the world, becoming the dawn of mankind’s future. this is a brand new story… survive the darkness, see the light.

title.en: Todokanu Kimi he Koi no Uta Wo

altTitles.en: Poems of Love to the Unreachable You

altTitles.ja: 届かぬ君へ 恋の詩を

description.en: His voice still echoes in my ears... If I can meet him again, even in a dream... Finn, a boy who was adopted by a wealthy family, was busy studying in order to meet his parents' expectations. One night, Finn, tired and returning to the room, suddenly saw a strange young man, when he looking into the mirror….
This is not the life I wanted!!! Twice lighter and twice more fun. The second <Life Survival> to restore the original history begins!

Shindou just became a new investigator for Tokki: The Special Mobile Investigation Force. On the day of his graduation, he finally saw the half-naked girl that he had always saw in his dream in real life and finds out that she's part of Tokko: The Special Public Safety Task Force. Shindou ends up joining Tokko to avenge his parents' deaths, whose bodies were ripped into pieces…

General of the Three Kingdoms, Kongming had struggled his whole life, facing countless battles that made him into the accomplished strategist he was. So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
description.ja: 五丈原の戦いで死期を迎えた名軍師・諸葛亮孔明は、若い肉体に戻り、現代日本へと転生した！ 渋谷のパリピ達に誘われ、たどり着いたのはダンスミュージックが鳴り響くチャラめなクラブ。そこでシンガーを目指す月見英子と出逢い、孔明の二度目の人生が幕を開けた！ 三国志時代、天下泰平のために生きた彼は、なんの為に生きるのか－－!!
description.ko:
오장원 전투에서 최후를 맞이한 명군사 제갈량(공명)은
젊은 육체로 돌아가 현대 일본에 환생한다!
시부야의 파티피플들에게 이끌려 도착 곳은
댄스 뮤직이 울려 퍼지는 경박스러운 클럽.
그곳에서 가수를 꿈꾸는 츠키미 에이코와 만나며
공명의 두 번째 인생이 막을 연다!
description.ru: Знаменитый стратег и военачальник Чжугэ Лян (Кунмин), погибший в битве при Годжохаре в полях Учжан, вернулся в молодое тело и перевоплотился в современной Японии, где он встретился с начинающей певицей Цукими Эйко, песни которой запали ему в сердце.
description.vi: Bậc thầy quân sự nổi tiếng - Gia Cát Lượng Khổng Minh - người đã chết trong trận Ngũ Trượng Nguyên trở lại với cơ thể khi còn trẻ và tái sinh về Nhật Bản hiện đại. Được những người mê tiệc tùng ở Shibuya dẫn đi, Khổng Minh đã tới hộp đêm vang vọng tiếng nhạc EDM. Ở đó Khổng Minh đã gặp Tsukimi Eiko, người có mục tiêu trở thành ca sĩ, cũng chính là người đã vén lên tấm màn cuộc sống thứ hai của ông. Người sống vì thiên hạ thái bình ở thời Tam Quốc như ông sẽ sống vì điều gì đây...!?
description.pt-br: General dos Três Reinos, Kongming lutou toda a sua vida, enfrentando inúmeras batalhas que o transformaram no estrategista talentoso que ele era. Então, em seu leito de morte, ele desejava apenas renascer em um mundo pacífico… e foi enviado direto para o centro de festas moderno, Tóquio! Pode até mesmo um estrategista brilhante como Kongming se adaptar às batidas selvagens e às pessoas festeiras ainda mais selvagens?!
description.zh-hk: 三國時代的孔明在五丈原抱憾離世，如今他恢復成年輕時的模樣，以一身古時打扮來到現代日本‧澀谷。突兀的裝扮讓人以為他是在COSPLAY，後來被人帶往夜店狂歡，他在那裡認識了一心想成為歌手的月見英子。聽了她的歌聲大為感動，於是自告奮勇擔任她的軍師！來到現代，孔明要如何發揮他的軍事長才來協助英子完成「霸業」呢…？

title.en: The Edgeless Sword From the Village

altTitles.ja: あつもりくんのお嫁さん（←未定）

description.en: One day middle school student Nishiki, who lives in the countryside, meets high school student Atsumori, who came to visit from Tokyo. When talking with the cool Atsumori, she starts noticing her desire to leave the countryside for Tokyo. But the way to Tokyo is unexpectedly through a marriage proposal?!?

altTitles.ja: 奴隷を調教してハーレム作る

altTitles.pt-br: Treinando escravas pra fazer um harem

altTitles.en: Training Slaves to Make a Harem

altTitles.es-la: Entrenando Esclavas Para Hacer Un Harem

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.es-la: Un hombre compra 3 esclavas Lolis para así poder criarlas y convertirlas en mujeres de su agrado para que posteriormente cuando crezcan completamente de acuerdo a sus gustos pueda hacerles el sin respeto a gusto las veces que quiera
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

altTitles.en: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

description.en:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
description.ko:
“마왕.”

그건.
인간이 되기 전, 전생의 나를 부르던 말이었다.

description.en: One day, a friend who used to enjoy playing games together contacts you to meet in person?!  Jo A-Yeong, who neither wants to meet people nor work, simply loves playing games. Do Gyeon-ho, making an inscrutable facial expression, appears mysteriously somewhere. Although we met in a game, can the two of us really spend time together like ordinary friends?
description.ko: 어느 날, 같이 게임을 즐겨하던 친구가 실제로 만나자고 연락을 해온다?! 사람을 만나고싶지도, 일을 하고싶지도 않은, 그저 게임을 좋아하던 조아영. 속을 알 수 없는 표정을 짓고 어딘가 신비스러워 보이는 도견후. 게임에서 만난 우리 둘이지만, 과연 정말 보통 친구들처럼 지낼 수 있을까?

altTitles.en: The Girl Who Can See Them

altTitles.th: มิเอรุโกะจัง ใครว่าหนูเห็นผี

altTitles.de: Mieruko-chan - Die Geister, die mich riefen

description.en:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
description.ru: Мико — старшеклассница, проклятая шестым чувством; у нее есть способность видеть призраков- Она пытается жить обычной жизнью, но трудно, когда призраки продолжают преследовать ее- Она также может видеть души людей, и она понимает, что люди — настоящие монстры.В один «прекрасный» день старшеклассница внезапно начала видеть призраков! Она не может от этого избавиться, но изо всех сил старается вести себя так, будто вообще их не видит. История девушки с шестым чувством начинается!

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

title.en: Little Tyrant Doesn't Want to Meet with a Bad End

altTitles.zh: 恶役少爷不想要破灭结局

altTitles.en: Evil Young Master Doesn't Want a Bad Ending
Little Tyrant Doesn't Want to End in Shambles

description.en: The day the little aristocratic tyrant, Roel Ascarte, met his younger foster sister was the day he regained his memories of his past life—and realized that this was the world of a popular gal game that he had played before. What’s more, he was the main route's antagonist! Just how can he avoid his demise? Now that Roel has awakened to the system, he sets off on the path of self-preservation!
description.zh: 贵族恶少罗亚·阿卡特在见到义妹的当天想起了前世的记忆，发现这里是曾经玩过的galgame的世界，而自己是游戏中公共线里绕不开的大反派。 如何才能回避掉自己的破灭结局呢？罗亚觉醒了系统，开始了求生之路。

altTitles.ja: 異世界ゆるり紀行 ～子育てしながら冒険者します～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Yururi Kikou: Kosodate Shinagara Bouken-sha Shimasu
Isekai Yururi Kikou: Kosodateshinagara Boukensha Shimasu

altTitles.en: Isekai Yururi Kikou - Raising Children While Being an Adventurer
Another World Leisurely Journey - Raising Children While Being an Adventurer
A Journey Through Another World ~Raising Kids While Adventuring~

altTitles.zh: 异世界悠闲纪行～边养娃边当冒险者～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界悠閒紀行 ~ 邊養娃邊當冒險者 ~

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Yururi Kikō ~ Kosodate Shinagara Bōken-sha Shimasu ~

description.en:
"I'm terribly sorry!"

Takumi gets accidentally killed by the wind god Syl and is reborn and summoned to another world. After giving Takumi his sincerest apologies, Syl grants Takumi with skills and sends him to the world Etelldia that Syl presides over. However, this new world is a vast forest filled with dangerous monsters!

In the forest, Takumi finds a young boy and girl who appear to be twins. He is worried about their safety and names them Alan and Elena, and decides to take care of them. He soon finds out to his surprise they are able to defeat a monster with their bare hands. The three of them reach a town, and Takumi decides to register at a guild to make a living. He begins his life as an adventurer while taking care of the two children.

An isekai fantasy about an adventurer with two kids!
description.it:
"Son veramente dispiaciuto"

Un dio si è improvvisamente chinato davanti a Kayano Takumi. Èù stato ucciso per errore. Tuttavia, può essere reincarnato. Però, da quanto ha detto dio, deve essere in un'altro mondo. Ma, dio commette un'altro errore teletrasportandolo in una pericolosa foresta… dove trova due gemelli. Fu così che Takumi decide di prendersi cura di loro.

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”
After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.

title.en: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou: Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!

altTitles.ja: ギャルメイドと悪役令嬢 ～おじょーさまのハッピーエンドしか勝たん！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~

altTitles.pl: Modna Służka i Antagonistka: Liczy Się Tylko Pomyślność Mojej Pani!

altTitles.en: Gal Maid & Villainess: Only Milady's Happy End Will Win!

description.en: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
description.pl: Gyaru o imieniu Serina zostaje reinkarnowana w świecie gry otome jako postać drugoplanowa, która zostaje sprzedana przez swoją rodzinę i teraz pracuje jako ekskluzywna pokojówka złoczyńcy Almelii. Yuri romcom
description.pt-br: Uma gyaru chamada Serina é reencarnada no mundo de um Otome game (jogo de "namoro"), como uma personagem secundária que é vendida por sua família e agora trabalha como a empregada exclusiva da vilã do jogo, Almelia. Confusões românticas Yuri de forma hilariantes se desdobram.

description.en: Rie and Yuri have been friends since childhood. Living together every day, Yuri thinks Rie needs a boyfriend. Does she even need one?
description.pt-br: Rie e Yuri são amigos desde criança. Convivendo todos os dias juntos, Yuri pensa que Rie precisa de um namorado. Será que ela precisa de um mesmo?

title.en: Tensei Shite Shota Ouji ni Natta Kensei wa, Katsute no Deshi ni wa Zettai ni Baretakunai

altTitles.ja: 転生してショタ王子になった剣聖は、かつての弟子には絶対にバレたくないっ

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shite Shota Ouji ni Natta Kensei ha, Katsute no Deshi ni ha Zettai ni Baretakunai

altTitles.en: Reincarnated. The Sword Saint Who Became A Shorty Prince To His Former Disciples ~ I Don't Want My Former Disciples To Find Out

altTitles.es-la: El Maestro de la Espada reencarna como un pequeño príncipe. ¡Su Antiguo Discípulo ahora es su tutor!

description.en:
Sword Saint Brise saved the country with his unique swordsmanship.

At the end of his magnificent life, he is reincarnated as the country's youngest prince, still retaining his memories. He seeks freedom again and aspires to enter the elementary school of knight school. Even though he is an invincible swordsman, he unexpectedly fails! 

“I came to get you.”

He looks like a child, but inside he's an invincible former swordsman. In his reincarnation, he is picked up by his former disciple!?

An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.
description.pt-br: Um antigo MMORPG chamado Live Dungeon. Antes do término do serviço, Kyotani Tsutomu fez uso completo de 5 notebooks para limpar o jogo e foi convidado para um mundo diferente. E então, Tsutomu ficou sem palavras quando viu um revezamento ao vivo de uma captura de masmorra no mundo diferente. Eles fizeram uma escavação sem pensar em estratégia. A desgraça de conseguir a posição de curador. Tsutomu restabeleceu o Mago Branco, que sempre fora seu favorito nos jogos, e pretendia conquistar a masmorra para encontrar a chave para sua fuga do mundo diferente.

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand.... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。

title.en: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu

altTitles.en: I Was Cheated On by My Girlfriend, but My Devilish Junior Now Yearns for Me

altTitles.ja: カノジョに浮気されていた俺が、小悪魔な後輩に懐かれています

altTitles.en: My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less!
Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.pt-br:
Época Natalina.

Hasegawa Yuuta se viu solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltavam apenas alguns dias para o Natal! Depois de uma conversa normal com sua amiga Mino Ayaka, Yuuta conheceu uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - em uma rua cheia de casais!

Seu nome era Shinohara Mayu. Será que esse encontro com Shinohara será o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

title.en: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou sareta Senshi no Mujikaku zama~

altTitles.ja: 経験値貯蓄でのんびり傷心旅行 ～勇者と恋人に追放された戦士の無自覚ざまぁ～

altTitles.en: A Warrior Exiled by the Hero and His Lover

description.en:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Mangyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

altTitles.ja: 閃光マック+パトロールX

description.en:
After 40 years, two heroes have arrived in the present day!!
Ilmine Daiji, the all-powerful sci-fi hero "Senkou Mac" and
'Patrol X' is now in book form for the first time!!

altTitles.th: ใต้ร่มวันฝนพรำ

description.en:
Sisters Ju-eun and Hye-jin lived a miserable life. After the death of their mother, their 'father', who had always been absent from their lives, suddenly appeared. Hye-jin, the older sister, agreed to his suggestion: if one of them joins the 'Daesung Group', he will rescue them from their poverty-stricken life. However... three years after entering 'Daesung Group', she dies in vain. This left Ju-eun struggling with despair at her helplessness in preventing her sister’s death. But then, she gets a new opportunity when she is brought back in time and Ju-eun decides to take her sister's place by becoming the daughter of the 'Daesung Group' that killed Hye-jin.

---
Sisters Ju-eun and Hyejin grew up in absolute poverty. After their mother’s death, Hyejin accepts the offer to join their estranged father’s wealthy family. But when Hyejin turns out dead just three years later, Ju-eun is grief-stricken. She grabs at the chance to travel back in time and take her sister’s place where she meets the kind but mysterious Iho.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---

description.en: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?

altTitles.ja: 未だ亡くなっていない人

altTitles.en: Wives Who have not Yet Passed Away
Wives Who Has Not Yet Passed Away

description.en: Haruka Kawarazaki, a young man aspiring to be a manga artist, and Mayuko Kawarazaki, a beautiful woman to whom everyone looks back. They live in a room in a flat, share a meal every night and lay on each other's skin. But they are not husband and wife. A woman whose heart has been broken and a young man who knows it but continues their relationship - a love suspense about a forbidden relationship that you can't stop even when you know it's wrong.
description.ja:
兄は逝き、義姉は壊れ、僕は溺れた

漫画家を目指す青年･河原崎遥と、誰もが振り返る美女･河原崎繭子。共に暮らし、毎夜、食事を共にし、肌を重ねる。しかし、二人は夫婦ではない。繭子は、遥の義姉。死んだ兄の妻なのだ。心が壊れてしまった女と、それを知りながら関係を続ける男―――
description.vi: Chuyện xoay quanh anh chàng Kawarazaki Haruka có ước mơ được trở thành một tác giả truyện tranh và Kawarazaki Mayuko, một người phụ nữ xinh đẹp khiến cho bất kỳ người đàn ông nào cũng đều không khỏi phải ngước nhìn. Hai người họ hiện đang cùng chung sống trong một căn hộ, nấu ăn cho nhau và thậm chí còn làm cả những chuyện chăn gối dù rằng cả hai thực ra không phải vợ chồng. Một mối quan hệ cấm kỵ giữa người phụ nữ đã tan nát cõi lòng và chàng thanh niên dù biết tất cả nhưng vẫn quyết định nhắm mắt làm ngơ mà tiếp tục duy trì mối quan hệ hiện tại.
description.es-la: Haruka Kawarazaki, un joven que aspira a ser Mangaka, y Mayuko Kawarazaki, una hermosa mujer a la que todos miran. Viven en una misma habitación, comparten una comida cada noche y se acuestan sobre la piel del otro. Pero no son marido y mujer. Una mujer con el corazón roto y un joven que lo sabe pero que continúa su relación: un thriller de amor sobre una relación prohibida que no puedes detener aunque sepas que está mal.
description.pt-br: A história segue o jovem aspirante a mangaká, **Haruka Kawarazaki**, e a deslumbrante, **Mayuko Kawarazaki**, que atrai a atenção de todos. Os dois vivem juntos em um apartamento, compartilham refeições todas as noites e satisfazem todos seus desejos carnais sobre a cama. No entanto, eles não são um casal. Uma mulher cujo coração foi partido e um jovem que sabe disso, mas que continua a sua relação. *― Um suspense romântico que retrata um relacionamento proibido que não pode ser interrompido, mesmo sabendo que é errado.*

altTitles.ja: 勇者宇宙ソーグレーダー

description.en:
The story revolves around Taira Yunokami a boy in fifth grade that helps his father run a food truck. One day, he meets a famished girl in a park on his way to school. After helping the girl, the city is suddenly attacked by Glutton, an inter-dimensional threat that endangers the world. 

Amidst the chaos Sworg, a young member of the Space Administration Bureau Braver saves both Taira and the girl. Sworg has come to Earth to pursue the enigmatic and malevolent Glutton. When fate brings Sworg and Taira together, they'll find themselves unexpectedly thrust into an extraordinary journey through multiple dimensions.

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~ Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week ~ 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en:
Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai’s time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. 

Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi’s orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school… 

Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

altTitles.ja: フルメタル・パニック!

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

altTitles.en: The Archduke's Gorgeous Wedding Was a Fraud

description.en:
I possessed the body of the fourth villainess, Shay, who was miserably killed by the other villains for desperately clinging to the male lead.
However, the male lead suddenly offered me an enormous amount of money, in exchange for a contract marriage to help him escape various romantic advances.

"You have to be the most gorgeous and wicked woman in the empire, so that no one will dare to approach me."

...Isn't this marriage a fraud?
Was what I was going to say, but the amount of money he offered was too tempting to refuse. Alright, before the original female lead appears, I'll show them who's the crazy bitch here.

"Dear customer, I'll do my best to help you!"
 
I was confident this was the original plan, however...
This man, whose affection and warmth know no bounds, said he can't imagine a life without me!

I think I somehow ended up getting money, power and even love!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en:
Iroha is an average student newly enrolled in Cipher Academy, a Spartan school where students must crack code after code after code with barely enough time to catch their breath! Then a mysterious person named Kogoe gives Iroha an unusual pair of glasses with a crazy secret behind them!

(Source: MANGA Plus)

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

description.en:
A group of employees from the Fujitani Pharmaceutical Company are on a hiking trip. After the company suffered a crisis, the CEO hopes to improve teamwork and morale among new and old employees with this trip. Not everyone is as excited as he is. Unfortunately for them, they soon find themselves having to deal with problems that they weren't prepared for.  
  
What's going to happen to these employees? Will they fall in love with hiking? Will they be able to work together, get along well, and bring the company back to its feet? Read and find out in this heartwarming story of adventure, friendship, and teamwork!
description.pt-br:
Um grupo de funcionários da Fujitani Pharmaceutical Company está em uma viagem de caminhada. Depois que a empresa sofreu uma crise, o CEO espera melhorar o trabalho em equipe e o moral entre novos e antigos funcionários com esta viagem. Nem todo mundo está tão animado quanto ele. Infelizmente para eles, eles logo se vêem tendo que lidar com problemas para os quais não estavam preparados.

O que vai acontecer com esses funcionários? Será que eles vão se apaixonar por caminhadas? Eles serão capazes de trabalhar juntos, se dar bem e trazer a empresa de volta aos seus pés? Leia e descubra nesta emocionante história de aventura, amizade e trabalho em equipe.

description.en: Sado Tarou became a masochist, one that feels pleasure from enduring physical and or psychological pain, in middle school when his classmate, Yuno Arashiko, punched him. Now that he has moved up to high school with his friend, Tatsukichi, he wants to get rid of this sexual tendency and live a regular teenage life. He hears about this high school club called the Number Two Volunteer Club, headed by Isurugi Mio. The club is there to advise and help students in various needs and trouble. The only problem is that Mio is an extremely violent and bossy girl, the type of person that treats Tarou terribly and arouses him at the same time. Tarou grudgingly asks for her help to solve his problem but what he doesn't know yet is that his life is about to get really complex.

title.en: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama o Horesasetai!

altTitles.ja: 崖っぷち令嬢は黒騎士様を惚れさせたい！

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama wo Horesasetai!

altTitles.es-la: ¡Quiero hacer que el Caballero Oscuro se Enamore de mi!

altTitles.en: I Want to Make Black-Knight Fall In Love With Me!

altTitles.pl: Chcę, żeby Czarny Rycerz Się We Mnie Zakochał

altTitles.en: A Noblewoman on the Brink of Disaster Wants to Make the Black Knight Fall in Love!

description.en:
My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment...
The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands".
In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
description.pl:
Moja rodzina jest zadłużona i nie mamy pieniędzy na leczenie chorej siostry...
Zmartwiona szlachcianka, Clarice, zostaje zaangażowana w polityczne małżeństwo z najbardziej przerażającym Czarnym Rycerzem w królestwie, Frostem, znanym z „zabijania bestii gołymi rękami”.
Chcąc zapewnić sobie fortunę, Clarice próbuje uwieść „Czarnego Rycerza”, ale gdy to robi, odkrywa „jej” sekret...
description.es-la:
Mi familia está endeudada, y no tenemos suficiente dinero para el tratamiento de mi hermana enferma...
La nobleza en apuros, Clarice, se encuentra comprometida en un matrimonio político con el Caballero Oscuro más temido del reino, Frost, quien es conocido por "matar bestias con sus propias manos"
Con la intención de asegurar la fortuna, Clarice intenta seducir al "Caballero Oscuro", pero justo cuando lo hace, descubre el secreto de "ella"...
